    Represents a Battle Unit.

    Companions
    Class representing the Companion Cavalry.

    Class representing Darius the III.
    GameStats
    Class that has public variables important to the game
    HowToPlayButton
    Creates the How to Play Button to display the How To Play Screen
    HowToPlayScreen
    Screen that shows the game controllers
    Hypaspists
    Class representing the Hypaspists.
    Immortals
    Class representing Persian Immortals.
    InfoButton
    Creates the Info Button to display the InfoScreen
    InfoScreen
    Screen that shows some information about the game
    Level
    Superclass of all the Battle maps.
    Lv1_Granicus
    The battle map of the first level, representing the Battle of river Granicus.
    Lv2_Issus
    The battle map of the second level, representing the Battle of Issus.
    Lv3_Gaugamela
    The battle map of the third level, representing the battle of Gaugamela.
    MenuScreen
    Screen that displayes the Main Menu with some choices.
    PersianCavalry
    Class representing the Persian Cavalry.
    PersianInfantry
    Class representing the Persian Infantry.
    ReplayButton
    Creates the Replay Button, to replay a certain level.
    ReturnToMenuButton
    Creates the Return to Main Menu Button to return to the menu after a battle loss
    Sarissophoroi
    Class representing the Sarissa phalanx.
    Screen
    Simple superclass for all the Screens of the game.
    SmoothMover
    Class that handles the movement of the actors.
    StartButton
    Creates the Start button to initiate the game or the battle.
    StoryScreen
    Depending the level which the player is, is displays the appropriate screen and buttons.
    Tip
     
    Vector
    A 2D vector.
